00002 #include "FileChooser.h"

00004 string FileChooser::chooseFile(int type, string filter, string name){
00005         // Create the file chooser, and show it
00006         Fl_File_Chooser chooser(".",                        // directory
00007                 filter.c_str(),                        // filter
00008                 type,     // chooser type
00009                 name.c_str());        // title
00010         chooser.show();
00011 
00012         // Block until user picks something.
00013         //     (The other way to do this is to use a callback())
00014         //
00015         while(chooser.shown())
00016         { Fl::wait(); }
00017 
00018         // User hit cancel?
00019         if ( chooser.value() == NULL )
00020         { fprintf(stderr, "(User hit 'Cancel')\n"); return ""; }
00021 
00022         return chooser.value(0);
00023 }
